name: Puppy donut maker pals
description:
Wow! It is a real sweet cafe! In this kitchen you can meet your favorite dogs and play together! This is a donut making games!
If you love sweets, candy, chocolate, fruit, vanilla, caramel and marshmallow, you can make it by yourself just now!
In dogs kitchen you will find flour, milk, sugar, butter, eggs, syrup and fruits! Mix the ingredients and make the sweetest donuts! Put forms in the own and wait a few minutes! Add topping, cream, fruits and syrup!
You can decorate your donuts by stickers! Puppy have a bingo collection of sticker! Use it all! Eat your donuts with dogs, puppies, friend and parents!
